Dear Harry:
Thanks for sending Irv's letter commenting on radio items
in the Fact Sheet Service. This does remind one that there
is usually some difference of opinion on every question.
Of course, I do not agree that the inclusion of digests of
pertinent radio research would "look like padding" . It
seems to me that anyone who is interested in information
about radio would appreciate the additional items rather than
resent their inclusion.
As I now understand it, you have been including the radio
digests that have been available to you as bonus sheets or
extra items of special interest. I agree that this is a
satisfactory approach until more radio research renorts
reach you. After all, the only thing that matters is that
we get information on whatever radio research is being reÂ¬
ported .
Your usual careful attention to the subject is appreciated.
